titleStmt.title: The glasse of gouernement A tragicall comedie so entituled, bycause therein are handled aswell the rewardes for vertues, as also the punishment for vices. Done by George Gascoigne Esquier. 1575. Seen and allowed, according to the order appointed in the Queenes maiesties iniunctions.
Glass of governement
titleStmt.author: Gascoigne, George, 1542?-1577.

notesStmt.note: Colophon reads "Imprinted at London in Fleetestreate at the signe of the Faulcon by Henry Middleton, for Christopher Barker. Anno Domini. 1575.". A later state (STC 11643) has N1 in a different setting; Middleton is identified only by his initials, and errata are printed below the colophon.
Running title reads: The glasse of gouernment.
